name: Reach for the Suns
description:
Press escape to quit, WASD or arrows to move. 

In this game, you used WASD or arrow keys to grow the plant, and control the direction of growth. S or the down arrow will retract the growth of the plant. If you collect sun's it will increase the total length you can extend to. This game is very short, and the goal is to get to the end. 

Tip: If you get stuck facing a wall, you can continue holding forward and either left or right in order to eventually "bounce" off the wall.
